content: Quiet people have the loudest minds.
author: Stephen Hawking

content: The quieter you become the more you can hear.
author: Ram Dass

content: Never love anybody who treats you like you're ordinary
author: Oscar Wilde

content: Pleasure in the job puts prefection in the work.
author: Aristotle

content: Hard work beats talent when talent doesn't work hard.
author: Tim Notke

content: Open your mind, before open your mounth...
Quiet the mind and the soul will speak.
author: Ma Jaya Sati Bhagavati

content: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life.
author: Steve Jobs

content: Do it for peace of mind.
author: Leslie Norwalk

content: There is no path to peace. Peace is the path
author: Mahatma Ghandi

content: Only the dead have seen the end of war.
author: Plato

content: The two most powerful warriors are patience and time.
author: Leo Tolstoy

content: Knowledge comes from learning. Wisdom comes from living.
author: Anthony Douglas Williams

content: Intelligence is the ability to adapt to change.
author: Stephen Hawking

content: Real knowledge is to know the extent of one's ignorance.
author: Confucius
